title: #69 - Tom Segura
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are joined by comedian and fellow podcaster- Tom Segura! Together we discuss words you can't say anymore, Netflix, Jared Fogle's fat brother, weight loss, bidets (of course), and learn that Tom isn't about them ghost stories. Tom Segura latest comedy special "Disgraceful" is on Netflix and he is going on tour in the US starting this August.
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
